results.name: Sum of 5th powers of digits of n.
comment: Fixed points are listed in A052464. - _M. F. Hasler_, Apr 12 2015
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
K. Chikawa, K. Iséki, T. Kusakabe, and K. Shibamura, Computation of cyclic parts of Steinhaus problem for power 5, Acta Arithmetica 7 (1962), 253-254. [From _Don Knuth_, Sep 07 2015]
Index entries for Colombian or self numbers and related sequences
formula: a(10n+k) = a(n) + k^5, 0 <= k < 10. - _Hieronymus Fischer_, Jun 25 2007
program: (MAGMA) [0] cat [&+[d^5: d in Intseq(n)]: n in [1..45]]; // _Bruno Berselli_, Feb 01 2013
results.author: _Henry Bottomley_, May 31 2000
